Products.name: TayzGrid
Products.description: TayzGrid is an extremely fast and scalable in-memory data grid for Java that stores application data and reduces expensive database trips.

news.title: Alachisoft Showcases Java In-Memory Data Grid at Oracle's JavaOne, San Francisco

Products.name: NCache 4.1 SP3
Products.description: NCache is an extremely fast and scalable in-memory distributed cache that caches application data and reduces expensive database trips.

Products.name: NCache Open Source
Products.description: NCache is a 100% Native .NET Open Source distributed cache (released under Apache License, Version 2.0).

Products.name: TierDeveloper (Free)
Products.description: TierDeveloper is an object to relational mapping (O/R mapping) code generator that lets you develop extremely high performance .NET
